Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can represent a string telephone that allows two people to communicate over a distance.
The student can show how sound travels through the string to solve the problem of communication.
The student can depict the materials used to build the string telephone, using only the provided materials.
The student can illustrate the importance of the string being pulled tight for communication to work.
The student can highlight how this device uses sound to send information.
